author: slive
msg: I hope Will doesn't mind me cluttering up his carefully desgined page...
Since these are probably the most downloaded files on apache.org, and
since people often get directly linked to this page, provide a direct
link to the right spot on the mirrors.

author: slive
msg: My completely unscientific survey of server-status shows an improvement
(ie decrease) in the number of people downloading the .zip, but
there are still enough there that I think we can improve this more.
So I've renamed the files with "src" instead of "build".
I'm neutral about doing the same with the unix source files.

author: gregames
msg: tweak "requests currently being processed".  It is confusing to not have
old generation requests included after a graceful restart.  But we
shouldn't count workers who are starting up.
OTOH, the "ready" counter needs to pay attention to the generation, so it
stays in sync with how p_i_s_m counts idle workers.
